snippet: The blood-covered girl, with puncture wounds to her neck and face, was found cradled in her babbling mother’s arms in an apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant before dawn on Friday.
abstract: The blood-covered girl, with puncture wounds to her neck and face, was found cradled in her babbling mother’s arms in an apartment in Bedford-Stuyvesant before dawn on Friday.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and TIM STELLOH

headline.main: Mother in Custody After Death of Girl, 2, in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Mother in Custody After Death of Girl, 2, in Brooklyn
